snippet: President Petro O. Poroshenko, speaking at a news conference in the capital, described the battle as a show of strength and resolve by his country’s military.
abstract: Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko tries to rally international support to maintain pressure on Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin, including sanctions, for Russia's backing of separatist forces in Ukraine; Poroshenko's efforts, which include interviews with foreign journalists, news conference and phone calls to world leaders, are being undertaken in advance of summit meeting of Group of 7 nations.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Petro O. Poroshenko, speaking at a news conference in the capital, described the battle as a show of strength and resolve by his country’s military.

headline.main: Ukraine Repels Separatists in Fierce Fighting, Poroshenko Says
